Segment.name: CLM
Segment.comment: To specify basic data about the claim

Field.name: PatientAccountNumber
Field.comment: Identifier used to track a claim from creation by the health care provider through payment

Field.name: MonetaryAmount
Field.comment: Monetary amount

Field.name: ClaimFilingIndicatorCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of claim

Field.name: NonInstitutionalClaimTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of provider or claim

Field.name: HealthCareServiceLocationInformation
Field.comment: To provide information that identifies the place of service or the type of bill related to the location at which a health care service was rendered

Field.name: ProviderOrSupplierSignatureIndicator
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: MedicareAssignmentCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether the provider accepts assignment

Field.name: BenefitsAssignmentCertificationIndicator
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: ReleaseOfInformationCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether the provider has on file a signed statement by the patient authorizing the release of medical data to other organizations

Field.name: PatientSignatureSourceCode
Field.comment: Code indicating how the patient or subscriber authorization signatures were obtained and how they are being retained by the provider

Field.name: RelatedCausesInformation
Field.comment: To identify one or more related causes and associated state or country information

Field.name: SpecialProgramCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the Special Program under which the services rendered to the patient were performed

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode3
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: LevelOfServiceCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the level of service rendered

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode4
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: ProviderAgreementCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of agreement under which the provider is submitting this claim

Field.name: ClaimStatusCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the status of an entire claim as assigned by the payor, claim review organization or repricing organization

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode5
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: ClaimSubmissionReasonCode
Field.comment: Code identifying reason for claim submission

Field.name: DelayReasonCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the reason why a request was delayed
